Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago White Sox (31-107) are set to take on the Baltimore Orioles (79-59) at Oriole Park at Camden Yards on September 2, 2024.
The Orioles currently hold the second spot in the AL East, trailing only the New York Yankees.
The White Sox have lost their last ten games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This matchup kicks off a three-game series between these two teams.
The Orioles have dominated the season series, currently leading 4-0 against the White Sox.
Others: Chris Flexen will take the mound for the White Sox, boasting a record of 2-13 with a 5.29 ERA, while the Orioles' Corbin Burnes comes in with a solid 12-7 record and a 3.23 ERA.
The White Sox will be without key players like Yoan Moncada and Mike Clevinger, while the Orioles are missing Dean Kremer and Ramon Urias.
